Title: Voluntold
Plot: Even as Marcus and Sam learn that they have been charged with treason against the United States, a greater threat within their own crew is brewing. Meanwhile, an old friend of Sam's, Paul Wells, pays Christine a visit and tries to ease her fears about her husband.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Jay Karnes, Jessica Camacho, Will Rothhaar, Michael Gaston, David Rees Snell, Michael Mosley, Michael Ng, Bruce Davison, Jay Hernandez
